languages.text: "Да обретет часть бессмертия Его свято верующий в алых объятиях своего Императора. Несите весть, братья и сестры, — пир начался!"

traits.locale_text: "Да обрятет часть бессметрия Его свято верующий в алых объятиях своего Императора. Несите весть, братья и сестры, — пир начался!"

languages.text: "May the faithful partake of the Emperor's immortality and find solace in His crimson embrace. Spread the word, brothers and sisters — the feast has begun!"
languages.original_text: "Да обретет часть бессмертия Его свято верующий в алых объятиях своего Императора. Несите весть, братья и сестры, — пир начался!"

traits.locale_text: "May the faithful partake of the Emperor's immortality and find solace in His crimson embrace. Spread the word, brothers and sisters — the feast has begun!"
"May the faithful partake of the Emperor's immortality and find solace in His crimson embrace. Spread the word, brothers and sisters — the feast has begun!"
"May the faithful partake of the Emperor's immortality and find solace in His crimson embrace. Spread the word, brothers and sisters — the feast has begun!"
"May the faithful partake of the Emperor's immortality and find solace in His crimson embrace. Spread the word, brothers and sisters — the feast has begun!"
"May the faithful partake of the Emperor's immortality and find solace in His crimson embrace. Spread the word, brothers and sisters — the feast has begun!"

languages.text: “愿虔诚之人都能成为帝皇永生的一部分，在祂深红色的怀抱中找到慰藉。传播福音吧，兄弟们，姐妹们！盛宴开始了！”
languages.original_text: "May the faithful partake of the Emperor's immortality and find solace in His crimson embrace. Spread the word, brothers and sisters — the feast has begun!"

traits.locale_text: “愿虔诚之人都能成为帝皇永生的一部分，在祂深红色的怀抱中找到慰藉。传播福音吧，兄弟们，姐妹们！盛宴开始了！”

languages.text: «Que los fieles compartan la inmortalidad del Emperador y encuentren consuelo en Su abrazo carmesí. Difundid el mensaje, hermanos y hermanas: ¡el festín ha empezado!».
languages.original_text: "May the faithful partake of the Emperor's immortality and find solace in His crimson embrace. Spread the word, brothers and sisters — the feast has begun!"

traits.locale_text: «Que los fieles compartan la inmortalidad del Emperador y encuentren consuelo en Su abrazo carmesí. Difundid el mensaje, hermanos y hermanas: ¡el festín ha empezado!».

languages.text: 「信徒に不死身の皇帝より永遠の名声が与えられんことを。また、慈悲深き深紅の抱擁に包まれんことを。この祈りを広めたまえ、兄弟たちよ。祝祭のときは今！」
languages.original_text: "May the faithful partake of the Emperor's immortality and find solace in His crimson embrace. Spread the word, brothers and sisters — the feast has begun!"

traits.locale_text: 「信徒に不死身の皇帝より永遠の名声が与えられんことを。また、慈悲深き深紅の抱擁に包まれんことを。この祈りを広めたまえ、兄弟たちよ。祝祭のときは今！」

languages.text: « Puissent les fidèles profiter de l'immortalité de l'Empereur et trouver le réconfort dans Son étreinte écarlate. Parlez-en autour de vous, mes frères et mes sœurs. Le festin a commencé ! »
languages.original_text: "May the faithful partake of the Emperor's immortality and find solace in His crimson embrace. Spread the word, brothers and sisters — the feast has begun!"

traits.locale_text: « Puissent les fidèles profiter de l'immortalité de l'Empereur et trouver le réconfort dans Son étreinte écarlate. Parlez-en autour de vous, mes frères et mes sœurs. Le festin a commencé ! »

languages.text: "Mögen die Gläubigen teilhaben an der Unsterblichkeit des Imperators und in Seiner roten Umarmung Trost finden. Verkündet das Wort, Brüder und Schwestern – das Festmahl hat begonnen!"
languages.original_text: "May the faithful partake of the Emperor's immortality and find solace in His crimson embrace. Spread the word, brothers and sisters — the feast has begun!"

traits.locale_text: "Mögen die Gläubigen teilhaben an der Unsterblichkeit des Imperators und in Seiner roten Umarmung Trost finden. Verkündet das Wort, Brüder und Schwestern – das Festmahl hat begonnen!"

languages.text: "İnançlı olanlar İmparator'un ölümsüzlüğünden bir parçaya nail olup onun kızıl kucağında teselli bulsun. Kardeşlerim, duymayan kalmasın! Ziyafet başladı!"
languages.original_text: "May the faithful partake of the Emperor's immortality and find solace in His crimson embrace. Spread the word, brothers and sisters — the feast has begun!"

traits.locale_text: "İnançlı olanlar İmparator'un ölümsüzlüğünden bir parçaya nail olsun ve onun kızıl kucağında teselli bulsunlar. Kardeşlerim, duymayan kalmasın! Ziyafet başladı!"
